#### A dual package repository system, powered by R-universe

#### [Community](community.qmd)

An open and inclusive R package repository with transparent governance standards, built on open source infrastructure.

#### +

#### [Production](production.qmd)

A quarterly snapshot release of R packages, designed for deployment in production environments.

<br />
<hr />

This project originated from the [R Consortium Repositories Working Group](https://github.com/RConsortium/r-repositories-wg) and is supported by an R Consortium ISC grant.
